mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_name, password, phone, identity_card, state) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{identityCard}, #{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name=#{userName}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, identity_card=#{identityCard}, state=#{state} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name userName, password, phone, identity_card identityCard, state FROM user

SELECT id, user_name userName, password, phone, identity_card identityCard, state FROM user
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%' )
AND identity_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{identityCard},'%' )
AND phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%' )
SELECT id, user_name userName, password, phone, identity_card identityCard, state FROM user WHERE user_name = #{userName}
SELECT id, user_name userName, password, phone, identity_card identityCard, state FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
